item.title: Julia Resources
item.description: Julia Differentiable Programming JuliaDiff is an informal organization which aims to unify and document packages written in Julia for evaluating derivatives. The technical features of Julia, namely, multiple dispatch, source code via reflection, JIT compilation, and first-class access to expression parsing make implementing and using techniques from automatic differentiation easier than ever before (in our biased opinion). A compilation of differentiation tools in Julia can be found on GitHub.
